title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Intelligent security: Protection at scale from development to production-INV214
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 智能安全：从开发到生产的大规模保护-INV214
abstract: Discover how Amazon FSx Intelligent-Tiering for OpenZFS and Lustre delivers fully elastic file storage that simplifies management while automatically optimizing costs. In this session, we'll explore the architecture behind virtually unlimited storage capacity that automatically scales up and down with your workloads and intelligently moves data based on access patterns, without over-provisioning or operational overhead. We will demonstrate how FSx Intelligent-Tiering delivers high-performance storage, achieving millions of IOPS, terabytes per second of throughput, and sub-millisecond latencies for your large datasets.
abstract_cn: 了解 Amazon FSx Intelligent-Tiering for OpenZFS 和 Lustre 如何提供完全弹性的文件存储，在简化管理的同时自动优化成本。在本次会议中，我们将探讨几乎无限存储容量背后的架构，该架构可根据您的工作负载自动扩展和缩减，并根据访问模式智能移动数据，无需过度配置或运维开销。我们将演示 FSx Intelligent-Tiering 如何为您的大型数据集提供高性能存储，实现数百万 IOPS、每秒 TB 级吞吐量以及亚毫秒级延迟。
